attributes.action: Make the enactment of referenda results FULLY binding on Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
We therefore demand that the Government bring forward legislation to enshrine in UK law the complete and total commitment of Parliament to enact the FULL result of any future referenda.

We further demand that such legislation will make it illegal for Parliament to deliver on anything other than the FULL result, i.e. individual aspects of any referenda will NOT be subject to separate delivery, and there will be no half measures.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, are concerned that the result of the 2016 EU referendum has been completely subverted by the actions of the UK Parliament.
